Hi everyone.

Portugal is now beginning its national web archiving initiative with 
project Tomba at FCCN (National
Foundation for Scientific Computing).

We are now beggining to use Heritirx 1.12.1 and we would appreciate some 
hints on how to configure Heritrix for our purposes.

We would like to crawl:

- All the sites referenced by the seeds until a maximum number of 3 hops 
in a breadth first fashion, including seeds from several domains plus,
- All the sites hosted on the .PT domain newly found during the crawl, 
(not part of the seeds), until a maximum number of 3 hops in a breadth 
first fashion counting from the home page of the site. If the hops 
counting would begin on a landing page different from the home page of 
the new site it is also ok.

We tried to configure max-hops, max-trans-hops and max-speculative-hops 
but this are all counted from the seeds.

Basically, we would like that the counting of hops would be reset 
everytime we visit a new site, independently from it is a seed or not.

Could you please help us?

Best regards.
